patthana15.67:1.1: Niyyānikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyyāniko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Aniyyānikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyyāniko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.67:2.1: Aniyyānikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyyāniko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Abyākatamūlaṃ dve paccayavasena.)
